data.actual_result: You are effectively moved, but the admin options diseappear from the menu  (anyway the menu is supposed to close), and you disappear from the voice user list until you re-open it
data.expected_result: The pop up should close and you will appear connected under the new channel you picked
data.short_description: After moving yourself to another voice channel, the pop up won't close and you will appear disconnected even though you're not
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel in a server you have Move permissions - In the voicd channel list tap on yourself. A menu should pop up with voice administration options - Move yourself to another voice channel
